name: Solar Gardener
description:
Explore an open-world solar system, cultivate alien plants, learn about the story of the previous gardener.

Your predecessor was told to make this into the "most cliché system ever". But now it's your turn!
How will you spread the plants to create a beautiful garden?

Take care though, since each plant has unique needs and preferences. Your plants will only thrive if their needs are met.

Credits

Nils Wallenfang - Design, Programming

Nitai Heeb - Design, Programming

Stefan Horrmann - 3D Modeling

Niels Asselborn - 3D Modeling

Paul Shelley - Sound Design

Thimras - Soundtrack, Voice Acting

The source code is available on Github. We made everything ourselves except for these third-party assets.

Having performance issues? You can lower the graphic settings or play the downloaded game.
